story:
Let me craft this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a versatile professional whose career journey spans various customer-facing roles. After graduating from Moises E. Molina High School in July 2015, they immediately jumped into the workforce as a Team Member at a food service establishment. There, they mastered the art of food preparation, customer service, and training new workers, while keeping their workspace spotless and being the go-to person for menu inquiries.

While working, they pursued their passion for beauty and wellness, earning an Associate of Arts degree from Tint School of Makeup & Cosmetology in March 2016, becoming a certified Nail Technician. This achievement led to new opportunities, and by December 2015, they had secured dual positions at a hotel.

As a Front Desk Receptionist, they became the welcoming face of the establishment, masterfully handling everything from guest check-ins to phone calls, and even managing the hotel rewards program. Simultaneously, they worked in Room Service, where they orchestrated the entire dining experience - from taking orders to ensuring guests were comfortably situated with their meals.

Their most recent role as a Sales Representative in October 2017 allowed them to utilize their mathematical skills and customer service expertise in handling lottery sales and managing the reception area. Throughout their career, they've maintained a reputation for being bilingual, hardworking, and incredibly quick to learn new skills.

Their professional journey showcases someone who consistently delivers friendly, professional service while efficiently managing multiple responsibilities. Whether it's operating office equipment, handling payments, or resolving customer concerns, they bring enthusiasm and dedication to every role.
